price: 3. Bondeko kati na bino mpe bana na bino bakosalisa bino na eloko te. О mokolo ya suka akokabola okati na bino, kasi Allah azali kornona maye bozali kosala.
arabic: لَن تَنفَعَكُمۡ أَرۡحَامُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡۚ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
category: She that is to be Examined

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lan tanfaʿakum arḥāmukum walā awlādukum yawma al-qiyāmati yafṣilu baynakum wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
